'''Genshin Impact × Gong cha''' is a collaborative effort between ''[[Genshin Impact]]'' creators [[miHoYo]] and {{w|Gong Cha|Gong cha}}.

{{Description|From June 15 to August 31, enjoy exclusive themed cups and receive a scratch card with in-game rewards with every 10% top-up purchase of your favorite Gong cha drinks. Don’t miss out on this limited-time adventure! }}

==Collaborations==
To date, there has been '''1''' collaboration between ''Genshin Impact'' and Gong cha.

===2024 - Klee and Jean===
This collaboration features cups with a custom theme centered around [[Klee]] and [[Jean]].

Additionally, the drinks also comes with a redemption code which includes:
* {{Item|Primogem|x=40}}
* {{Item|Fruity Smoothie|x=2}}
* {{Item|Fruity Duet|x=2}}
* {{Item|Cheese and Dew Teatime|x=1}}

Redemption code rules:
Each user ID can only redeem 1 redemption code from Gong cha
during the validity period. After you've successfully redeemed
the code, please claim your rewards via in-game mail within
30 days. Terms & Conditions apply.

====Event Details====

# Terms and Conditions:
# Top up 10% to any Gong cha beverage of your choice to get exclusive one (1) Genshin Impact x Gong cha collaboration cup and one (1) Genshin Impact scratch card.
# Available for walk-in transactions and D-Store mobile ordering via GLife.
# Applicable for Cash, Scan to pay or E-wallet transactions.
# Valid from June 15, 2024 to August 31, 2024.
